overview: Mr. Benedetto oversees Southpawâ€™s Investor Relations program. Prior to joining Southpaw, Mr. Benedetto was a Partner at Benedetto, Gartland & Company, Inc. from 1997 to 2007 where he focused on raising capital for sponsors of private equity and hedge funds. At Benedetto, Gartland, he originated and managed numerous fundraisings for leading investment firms and maintained strong relationships with endowments, foundations, fund-of-funds, insurance companies and pension plans. Previously, Mr. Benedetto was with the Mergers and Acquisitions department at Merrill Lynch & Co. Mr. Benedetto received a B.A. in philosophy from Georgetown University and an M.B.A. from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.
